title: EuroleagueBasketball
text: euroleague_basketball dataset includes information sourced publicly available basketball records Wikipedia. cleaned structured easy use R.

title: EuroleagueBasketball
text: can install development version package directly GitHub:
code: # Install devtools if not already installed install.packages("devtools")  # Install the package from GitHub devtools::install_github("natanast/EuroleagueBasketball")  # Load data library(EuroleagueBasketball) data(euroleague_basketball)

title: EuroleagueBasketball
text: EuroleagueBasketball R package provides data Euroleague basketball teams, including home cities, arenas, capacities, historical performance Final Four. dataset useful basketball analysis, sports enthusiasts, data visualization projects.

title: Euroleague Basketball Teams Data — euroleague_basketball
text: Cleaned information Euroleague teams: home cities, arenas, capacities, historical performance (Final Four appearances titles).

title: Euroleague Basketball Teams Data — euroleague_basketball
text: data frame following variables: Team Basketball team name (character). Home city City team based (character). Arena Arena(s) used team (character). Capacity Seating capacity; kept character commas (e.g., "10,000"). Last season Team placement recent completed season (character). Country Country team located (character). FinalFour_Appearances Number Final Four appearances (character, scraped/cleaned). Titles_Won Number Euroleague titles won (character, scraped/cleaned). Years_of_FinalFour_Appearances Comma-separated years Final Four appearances (character). Years_of_Titles_Won Comma-separated years titles (character).

title: Euroleague Basketball Teams Data — euroleague_basketball
text: Wikipedia: EuroLeague page; merged curated finals file. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EuroLeague package's data-raw/ scripts.
